siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
With the Pyramids and Xivu Arath destabilizing the system, Empress Caiatl, leader of the Cabal and daughter of Calus, seeks an alliance. But when she demands more than Zavala can offer, negotiations collapse, and Guardians must become the tip of the spear that strikes at her growing war council. 

New gear, XP, rewards! Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Seasonal armor set and the new Solar Bow, Ticuu's Divination. You also get an XP boost that speeds up your Seasonal ranks and engram unlocks.

Learn more: bung.ie/seasonofthechosen

FOLLOW DESTINY:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DestinyTheGame
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/destinythegame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/destinythegame
Discord: http://www.discord.gg/destinygame
 
FOLLOW BUNGIE:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Bungie/
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/bungie
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bungie/
⠀ ⠀ ⠀ ⠀
Dive into the free-to-play world of Destiny 2 to experience responsive first-person shooter combat, explore the mysteries of our solar system, and unleash elemental abilities against powerful enemies. Create your Guardian and collect unique weapons, armor, and gear to customize your look and playstyle. Experience Destiny 2’s cinematic story alone or with friends, join other Guardians for challenging co-op missions, or compete against them in a variety of PvP modes.
blogPost.body:
With the Pyramids and Xivu Arath destabilizing the system, Empress Caiatl, leader of the Cabal and daughter of Calus, seeks an alliance. But when she demands more than Zavala can offer, negotiations collapse, and Guardians must become the tip of the spear that strikes at her growing war council. 

New gear, XP, rewards! Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Seasonal armor set and the new Solar Bow, Ticuu's Divination. You also get an XP boost that speeds up your Seasonal ranks and engram unlocks.

Learn more: bung.ie/seasonofthechosen

FOLLOW DESTINY:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DestinyTheGame
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/destinythegame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/destinythegame
Discord: http://www.discord.gg/destinygame
 
FOLLOW BUNGIE:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Bungie/
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/bungie
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bungie/
⠀ ⠀ ⠀ ⠀
Dive into the free-to-play world of Destiny 2 to experience responsive first-person shooter combat, explore the mysteries of our solar system, and unleash elemental abilities against powerful enemies. Create your Guardian and collect unique weapons, armor, and gear to customize your look and playstyle. Experience Destiny 2’s cinematic story alone or with friends, join other Guardians for challenging co-op missions, or compete against them in a variety of PvP modes.
blogPost.title: Destiny 2: Beyond Light - Season of the Chosen Trailer
blogPost.author: destinygame

localize.title: 命运2：超越光明--天选之季预告片
localize.description:
随着金字塔和Xivu Arath破坏系统的稳定，Caiatl皇后，Cabal的领导人和Calus的女儿，寻求联盟。但当她的要求比扎瓦拉能提供的更多时，谈判就会崩溃，而守护者们必须成为打击她不断壮大的战争委员会的矛尖。

新装备、XP、奖励! 获得赛季通行证，立即解锁新的季节性盔甲套装和新的太阳弓--Ticuu的占卜。你还可以获得XP提升，加快你的季节性等级和恩典解锁的速度。

了解更多：bung.ie/seasonofthechosen

关注DESTINY。
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DestinyTheGame
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/destinythegame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/destinythegame
Discord: http://www.discord.gg/destinygame
 
关注BUNGIE。
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Bungie/
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/bungie
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bungie/
⠀ ⠀ ⠀ ⠀
潜入《命运2》的免费游戏世界，体验反应灵敏的第一人称射击战斗，探索太阳系的奥秘，并释放元素能力对抗强大的敌人。创建你的守护者，收集独特的武器、盔甲和装备，以定制你的外观和玩法。独自或与朋友一起体验《命运2》的电影故事，加入其他守护者执行具有挑战性的合作任务，或在各种PvP模式中与他们竞争。

localize.title: 命運2：超越光明--天選之季預告片
localize.description:
隨着金字塔和Xivu Arath破壞系統的穩定，Caiatl皇后，Cabal的領導人和Calus的女兒，尋求聯盟。但當她的要求比扎瓦拉能提供的更多時，談判就會崩潰，而守護者們必須成爲打擊她不斷壯大的戰爭委員會的矛尖。

新裝備、XP、獎勵! 獲得賽季通行證，立即解鎖新的季節性盔甲套裝和新的太陽弓--Ticuu的占卜。你還可以獲得XP提升，加快你的季節性等級和恩典解鎖的速度。

瞭解更多：bung.ie/seasonofthechosen

關注DESTINY。
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DestinyTheGame
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/destinythegame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/destinythegame
Discord: http://www.discord.gg/destinygame
 
關注BUNGIE。
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Bungie/
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/bungie
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bungie/
⠀ ⠀ ⠀ ⠀
潛入《命運2》的免費遊戲世界，體驗反應靈敏的第一人稱射擊戰鬥，探索太陽系的奧祕，並釋放元素能力對抗強大的敵人。創建你的守護者，收集獨特的武器、盔甲和裝備，以定製你的外觀和玩法。獨自或與朋友一起體驗《命運2》的電影故事，加入其他守護者執行具有挑戰性的合作任務，或在各種PvP模式中與他們競爭。

previous.excerpt:
The first 1000 people to use this link will get a free trial of Skillshare: 
https://skl.sh/kurzgesagtinanutshell01211

Sources & further reading:
https://sites.google.com/view/sources-nuclear-death-toll/

Nuclear energy creates an uneasy feeling of danger for many people: ancient and dangerous minerals are concentrated to awaken seemingly unnatural powers, creating toxic elements that, if they escape, can and have killed people in horrible ways. How many people has nuclear energy killed and how?

previous.title: How Many People Did Nuclear Energy Kill? Nuclear Death Toll

localize.title: 核能害死了多少人？核能死亡人数
localize.description:
前1000名使用此链接的人将获得技能共享的免费试用。
https://skl.sh/kurzgesagtinanutshell01211

来源和进一步阅读。
https://sites.google.com/view/sources-nuclear-death-toll/

核能让很多人产生了一种不安的危险感：古老而危险的矿物被浓缩起来，唤醒了看似不自然的力量，产生了有毒元素，这些元素一旦逸散出来，就会并且已经以可怕的方式杀死人。核能害死了多少人，如何害死的？

next.excerpt:
Witness the incredible rise of Billie Eilish in "Billie Eilish: The World’s A Little Blurry” as she tours and records the album that changes her life. Watch on Apple TV+ February 26: https://apple.co/_BillieEilishDoc 

"Billie Eilish: The World’s A Little Blurry” tells the true coming-of-age story of the singer-songwriter and her rise to global superstardom. From award-winning filmmaker R.J. Cutler, the documentary offers a deeply intimate look at this extraordinary teenager’s journey, at just seventeen years old, navigating life on the road, on stage, and at home with her family, while writing, recording and releasing her debut album “WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?” 

The documentary is from Apple Original Films, in association with Interscope Films, Darkroom, This Machine and Lighthouse Management & Media. Directed by R.J. Cutler and starring Billie Eilish, Finneas O’Connell, Maggie Baird, and Patrick O’Connell as themselves. 

Song:
“bury a friend” by Billie Eilish http://apple.co/buryafriend
“when the party’s over” by Billie Eilish http://apple.co/whenthepartysover 

Follow Billie Eilish:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/billieeilish 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/billieeilish 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/billieeilish
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/BillieEilish 
Email: http://smarturl.it/BillieEilishEmail 
Store: http://smarturl.it/BillieEilishStore

Follow Apple TV:
Instagram: https://instagram.com/AppleTV 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/AppleTV 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AppleTV 
Giphy: https://giphy.com/AppleTV 
More from Apple TV: https://apple.co/32qgOEJ 

Subscribe to Apple TV’s YouTube channel: https://apple.co/AppleTVYouTube 

Apple TV+ is a streaming service with original stories from the most creative minds in TV and film. Watch now on the Apple TV app: https://apple.co/_AppleTVapp 

#BillieEilish #TheWorldsALittleBlurry #Documentary #AppleTV

localize.title: Billie Eilish: 世界上最模糊的地方 - 官方预告片 #2 | Apple TV+!
localize.description:
在 "Billie Eilish.The World's A Little Blurry "中，见证了Billie Eilish不可思议的崛起。世界有点模糊"，见证她的巡演和录制改变她生活的专辑。2月26日在Apple TV+观看：https://apple.co/_BillieEilishDoc 

"Billie Eilish: 世界有点模糊》讲述了这位歌手和作曲家的真实成长故事 以及她在全球范围内崛起的超级明星。由获奖电影制作人R.J.Cutler执导，这部纪录片深入浅出地展现了这位年仅17岁的非凡少女在旅途中、舞台上、家中与家人相处，同时创作、录制并发行首张专辑 "WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO? "的历程。

这部纪录片由苹果原创电影公司出品，联合Interscope Films、Darkroom、This Machine和Lighthouse Management & Media。由R.J. Cutler执导，Billie Eilish、Finneas O'Connell、Maggie Baird、Patrick O'Connell自导自演。

歌曲：
"埋葬一个朋友"，由比利-艾利什http://apple.co/buryafriend。
"when the party's over" by Billie Eilish http://apple.co/whenthepartysover 

关注Billie Eilish。
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/billieeilish 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/billieeilish 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/billieeilish
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/BillieEilish 
电子邮件：http://smarturl.it/BillieEilishEmail 
商店：http://smarturl.it/BillieEilishStore

关注 Apple TV。
Instagram: https://instagram.com/AppleTV 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/AppleTV 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AppleTV 
Giphy: https://giphy.com/AppleTV 
更多来自Apple TV：https://apple.co/32qgOEJ 

订阅 Apple TV 的 YouTube 频道：https://apple.co/AppleTVYouTube。

Apple TV+ 是一项流媒体服务，由电视和电影界最具创意的人士提供原创故事。现在就在 Apple TV 应用中观看：https://apple.co/_AppleTVapp 

#BillieEilish #TheWorldsALittleBlurry #纪录片 #AppleTV

localize.title: Billie Eilish: 世界上最模糊的地方 - 官方預告片 #2 | Apple TV+!
localize.description:
在 "Billie Eilish.The World's A Little Blurry "中，見證了Billie Eilish不可思議的崛起。世界有點模糊"，見證她的巡演和錄製改變她生活的專輯。2月26日在Apple TV+觀看：https://apple.co/_BillieEilishDoc 

"Billie Eilish: 世界有點模糊》講述了這位歌手和作曲家的真實成長故事 以及她在全球範圍內崛起的超級明星。由獲獎電影製作人R.J.Cutler執導，這部紀錄片深入淺出地展現了這位年僅17歲的非凡少女在旅途中、舞臺上、家中與家人相處，同時創作、錄製併發行首張專輯 "WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO? "的歷程。

這部紀錄片由蘋果原創電影公司出品，聯合Interscope Films、Darkroom、This Machine和Lighthouse Management & Media。由R.J. Cutler執導，Billie Eilish、Finneas O'Connell、Maggie Baird、Patrick O'Connell自導自演。

歌曲：
"埋葬一個朋友"，由比利-艾利什http://apple.co/buryafriend。
